attributes.action: A section on the ballot for voters to put priority on leave, deal and stay in GE
attributes.additional_details: This could enable the next government/parliament to know what would be a good compromise. It would also separate out the Brexit issue from other manifesto pledges.
attributes.background:
I think a discussion on adding to the voters' ballot paper a priority on no-deal, deal and stay in the EU in the possible September/October 2019 general election.
The different types of deals should also be considered on the ballot.
